text: Uncle Buck is a 1989 American comedy-drama movie. It was directed by John Hughes. It stars John Candy and Amy Madigan, with Jean Louisa Kelly, Gaby Hoffmann, Macaulay Culkin, Jay Underwood, and Laurie Metcalf in supporting roles. It was released on August 16, 1989. ==Other websites== * * * * * * Uncle Buck at the 80s Movie Gateway Category:1989 comedy movies Category:1980s family movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American family movies Category:Movies about families Category:Movies directed by John Hughes Category:Movies produced by John Hughes Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies shot in Chicago Category:Screenplays by John Hughes Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Uncle Buck
